name: Noah x Barbour Wading Jacket
description: Inspired by Barbour’s Spey Jacket, the Wading Jacket is a new silhouette created exclusively for Noah. It retains the cropped and boxy style of the original, which was designed for waist-deep wading when fishing. Featuring two patch pockets and Barbour’s signature D-ring on the chest, the Wading Jacket is two inches longer and made of a dry cotton fabric. 100% hybrid aero cotton shell Based on the Classic Spey Jacket Original Barbour Tartan lining Noah and Barbour embroidery on pockets Inner storm skirt Cropped fit Neil is 6'1" and wearing size M

name: Noah x Barbour Waxed Madras Bedale Jacket
description: Made exclusively for Noah by Barbour. 100% hybrid aero cotton shell. Cotton plain weave lining on body. Heavy-duty two-way metal zip. Snap storm flap and storm collar. Bellowed front pockets with snap flaps and drain vents. Handwarmer storm pockets at waist. Double-vented back with snap closures. Interior pocket with velcro closure. Embroidered logo on lining and front pocket flaps. Dean is 6'2" and is wearing size M

name: Buffalo Plaid Zip Polo
description: Made in Portugal. 100% cotton interlock jacquard. Flat knit polo collar and cuffs. Split hem with side vents. Zipper opening. Embroidered logo on sleeve. Neil is 6'1" and wearing size M.

name: Noah x The Cure Incense
description: Made exclusively for Noah by Nippon Kodo. Patchouli scent with custom ceramic holder with logo cross. Incense is a ceremonial staple of Buddhism, and Japan has perhaps the strongest tradition of production and appreciation of this uniquely meditative substance. Ours is made by Nippon Kodo, which traces its roots back 400 years to the figure of Koju (Jyuemon Takai), who made incense for the Emperor. 50 incense sticks.

name: Camo Print Mini Tote
description: Made in U.S.A. 100% cotton canvas. 10"x7"x7". Printed logo

name: The Longshoreman Tote
description: Our Longshoreman Tote is the workhorse of bags—a rugged, all-purpose carryall inspired by the dockworkers who loaded and unloaded cargo from ships. Their gear was built for function and durability, and this modern interpretation is no different. Designed to haul anything and everything, the Longshoreman Tote features six exterior pockets, a water-resistant nylon-lined interior with dedicated compartments to keep essentials organized. A beach towel or laptop would be equally at home in this bag. This tote is built for the road, sea, and any adventure you can throw at it. Made in USA 100% cotton, 18oz heavy-duty canvas Six outside pockets Water resistant, wipe-clean 420D nylon lining, organizer pockets, and laptop sleeve Yacht cord and snap-hook key lanyard Heavy cotton webbing handles Size: 6"D x 14"H x 17"W (23 Flat) - 22” Handles

name: Classic Recycled Cotton Tee
description: Cotton is a resource-intensive material, and weaving it into fabric of consistent quality creates enormous amounts of waste--up to 500,000 pounds per week from a single factory. Using 100% recycled cotton means tolerating slightly less uniformity, but the fabric of these tees is soft-wearing while maintaining a slightly textured hand. It's heavier than our pocket and graphic tees, but not as heavy as our Practice Cloth, with a slightly boxier fit. Made in USA 100% recycled cotton, 6.5 oz heavyweight jersey

name: Classic Pocket Tee
description: Our Pocket Tees are now made in the USA. They've always been a staple product at Noah, and we've always offered them in multiple seasonal colors. But now they're made here, and the quality and price are the same. It's a milestone in our effort to manufacture in fair factories. Made in the USA 100% cotton Reactive dyed and washed for softness Printed logo on pocket This garment has been individually dyed producing a one-of-a-kind product. Due to the unique process color may fade or bleed after wash.

name: Core Logo Pocket Tee
description: This garment has been individually dyed producing a one-of-a-kind product. Due to the unique process color may fade or bleed after wash.We advise washing this product before wearing. name: Solovair Single Buckle Monk Shoe
description: You’ll recognize the distinctive sole and countercultural cache that comes with it. In the Monk Shoe, our partnership with Solovair has yielded a modern, functional twist on a traditional dress shoe. With a single strap and long, seamless vamp, it’s an unlikely but totally convincing marriage of tradition and contemporary style. Founded under the name NPS by five men in the village of Wollaston, Northamptonshire, known for its shoe industry, Solovair originally outfitted the British Army and later became the shoe that defined counterculture England through the 1990s. UK Sizes - if you wear a US size 9, buy a UK size 8. Made in England 100% leather upper Goodyear welt with patented Solovair sole technology Single buckle.

Besom back pockets with button-closure. Adjustable cinch belt on rear. Cuffed hem. There’s room to move in these chinos, and thoughtful details everywhere you look. The adjustable cinch will personalize your fit, while the cuffed hems will hold exactly where they should.

name: Solovair Tassel Loafer
description: Founded under the name NPS by five men in the village of Wollaston, Northamptonshire, known for its shoe industry, Solovair originally outfitted the British Army and later became the shoe that defined counterculture England through the 1990s. UK Sizes - buy one full size down from your US size. For example, if you wear a US size 9, buy a UK size 8. Made in England 100% leather upper with tassels and kiltie-style vamp Goodyear welt with patented Solovair sole technology.

name: Ripstop Cargo Short
description: Made in Portugal. 100% cotton ripstop. Elasticated drawstring waist. Two front slant pockets, two side cargo pockets and one back patch pocket. Neil is 6'1" and wearing size M

name: Relaxed Fit Rugby
description: Made in Canada. 100% cotton, 8.0 oz Practice Cloth with engineered stripes. Cotton twill collar and placket with 3 button closure and box stitch reinforcement. Rib knit cuffs. Split hem with side vents. Embroidered logo above sleeve cuff. Slightly boxier for an oversized and relaxed fit.

name: The Outrigger Jacket
description: The outrigger canoe is one of the oldest and most significant watercraft in human history, deeply rooted in the cultures of Polynesia, Micronesia, Melanesia, and Southeast Asia. The outrigger canoe is more than just a vessel; it embodies the spirit of exploration, innovation, and survival. This lightweight nylon jacket embodies the same balance of functionality and tradition, offering protection from the elements while staying light and effortless—just like the vessel that inspired it. Made in Portugal 100% nylon shell, 100% cotton lining Two front welt pockets Snap closure Elasticated cuffs and drawcord hem

name: Army Pant
description: Made in Portugal with fabric imported from Japan. 100% cotton herringbone. Shank button and zip-fly closure. Flat front. Front slant pockets. Two side cargo pockets with shank button closures. Two back welt pockets. Side adjusters on waist.

name: Classic Rugby

name: Double-Pleated Denim Pant

Our most formal denim option and also our most nuanced. These will hold the waist while preserving comfort, and are equally adept at dressing up or down.

name: Leather A-2 Jacket

name: Baseball Pant
description: The history of baseball pants dates back to the mid-19th century when players wore knickerbockers—loose-fitting pants ending below the knee—paired with long stockings, a look inspired by cricket. Our Baseball Pant pays homage to this treasured American pastime, blending classic sportswear heritage with a modern fit and everyday versatility—a piece as at home on city streets as it would be on the field. Made in Portugal 100% cotton moleskin from Brisbane Moss Button and zip fly closure Side seam pockets Back patch pocket Adjustable drawcord hem Dean is 6'2" and is wearing size 32

name: The James Tee
description: Until James Dean wore a plain white tee shirt in Rebel Without a Cause, the tee was simply an undershirt, never meant to be seen on its own. But with a pair of jeans and a jacket, he transformed it into a symbol of effortless cool and youthful rebellion—a look that forever changed the way we dress. Our James Tee pays homage to this youthful rebellion, embracing the simplicity and elegance of an understated garment. This season, we introduce a rib-knit binding collar, a new detail in our tee shirt offering that subtly reinforces our commitment to timeless design and thoughtful craftsmanship—a spirit that has been at the core of Noah since the very beginning. Made in Canada 100% combed cotton, 200gsm jersey Rib knit binding collar Blind hem Slim fit Neil is 6'1" and wearing size M

description: Our Oversized Poplin Shirt was designed to capture the crisp elegance of a classic shirt while embracing the effortless comfort needed for the hottest summer days. Made from a luminous, cool poplin, it drapes fluidly against the skin, moving with ease to create a relaxed, boxy silhouette that exudes understated sophistication—as effortless as a warm breeze. description: Made in Portugal. 100% Organic cotton. Tri-color twisted yarn. V-neck opening. Ribbed collar, hem sleeve openings. Dean is 6'2" and is wearing size M. Neil is 6'1" and wearing size M

description: UK Sizes - if you wear a US size 9, buy a UK size 8 Made in England by Solovair exclusively for Noah 100% leather upper. Goodyear welt with patented Solovair sole technology Single buckle

description: Made in Portugal. 80% organic cotton 20% nylon. Ribbed collar, hem and cuffs. Hannah is 5'11” and is wearing size M. Neil is 6'1" and wearing size M

name: Striped V-Neck Sweater
description: Made in Portugal. 100% Organic cotton. Fully-fashioned. V-neck opening. Ribbed collar, hem, and cuffs. Neil is 6'1" and wearing size M

name: Summer Shaker Sweater
description: Made in Portugal. 100% Organic cotton. Saddle shoulder. Pigment dyed and washed. Ribbed collar, hem and cuffs. Fully-fashioned. Neil is 6'1" and wearing size M. Hannah is 5'11" and wearing size M

name: 5-Pocket Denim Jean
description: Our selvedge denim is expertly crafted in Japan utilizing old world weaving techniques—the result is a highly compact, dense cloth which differs greatly from the conventional denim you see on the market today. The beauty in this style of weaving is the unique character in all the fabric produced. Every pair of jeans will be slightly different in appearance, with varying yarn character at the surface of the fabric. Made in USA 100% cotton, Japanese selvedge denim Classic 5-pocket style with zip fly, metal shank closure, and copper rivets Leather logo patch on back pocket Straight fit. Neil is 6'1" and wearing size 32 Hannah is 5'11" and wearing size 30

name: Sweater Polo
description: Made in Portugal. 100% Organic cotton. Two-button placket with polo collar. Ribbed hem and sleeve openings. Fully-fashioned

name: Braided Leather Belt
description: Made in Portugal 100% leather Solid brass hardware

name: Stovepipe Jean
description: Made in USA. 100% cotton, Japanese selvedge denim. Classic 5-pocket style with zip fly, metal shank closure, and copper rivets. Woven label on back pocket. Wide fit. Our most relaxed fit of jeans to date. Model is 6’1” and wears size 32

name: Classic Rugby
description: Made in Canada. 100% cotton, 8.0 oz Practice Cloth with engineered stripes. Cotton twill collar and three button placket. Rib knit cuffs. Split hem with side vents. Embroidered logo above sleeve cuff.

name: Nylon Mechanics Jacket
description: Made in Portugal. 100% nylon 100% cotton flannel lined body and self lined sleeves. Water repellent Pointed spread collar Front zipper closure Storm flap Two front fleece lined welt pockets Elasticated sides Envelope barrel cuffs Fits true to size, for a larger fit please consider sizing up. Neil is 6'1" and wearing size M

name: Bow Loafer
description: Made in Portugal. 100% leather upper and lining. Leather laces. Classic leather outsole with rubber heel reinforcement. Debossed logo on footbed

name: Anchor Logo 5 Panel
description: Made in USA. 65% polyester 35% cotton. Embroidered eyelets. Adjustable plastic snapback closure. Embroidered graphic on front

name: Single-Pleat Baggy Pant
description: Made in Portugal. 100% cotton peached twill, 11.5oz. Single-pleated. Zip fly and button closure. Side seam pockets. Back button flap pockets. Wide, baggy fit. Dean is 6'2" and is wearing size 32. Neil is 6'1" and wearing size 32

name: Ricky Jacket
description: Made in Portugal. 100% wool, 10oz from Locharron. Fully lined. Spread collar Front zipper closure Two front moleskin lined welt pockets Pleated at waistband Elasticated sides Envelope barrel cuffs Neil is 6'1" and wearing size M Hannah is 5'11” and is wearing size M

name: Buckle Loafer
description: Made in Portugal 100% leather upper and lining Adjustable leather strap with metal buckle Kilty details on toe Classic penny loafer leather outsole Debossed logo on footbed Here on the extreme side of preppy, we meet inspiration where it finds us. In the Buckle Loafer, that means tweaking a classic penny loafer outsole with a metal buckle and kilty detail that have historically been confined to women’s silhouettes.Loafers are medium width, recommend sizing up for wider feet.

name: Noah x Timex Lighthouse Watch
description: This item is pre-order only. By placing an order for this item, you acknowledge that shipping of this item is estimated to be on or around November 2025. If you order this with other available items, your order will be dispatched once all items are available. Please email us with any questions regarding your order. Discounts do not apply to this collaboration. All pre-order items are final sale. Made exclusively for Noah by Timex Quartz movement Gold-plated stainless steel case and buckle Mineral glass lens Croco pattern leather strap 30m water resistant 31 x 35 mm case 18mm lug Model's wrist is 6 3/4' in diameter

name: Striped Oxford Shirt
description: Made in Portugal. 100% cotton heavyweight oxford cloth. Full button-closure with button-down collar. Adjustable cuffs with button-closure. Pen pocket on left sleeve. Back pleats. Hannah is 5'11” and is wearing size M. Neil is 6'1" and wearing size M

name: Single-Breasted Cotton Jacket
description: Made in Portugal. 100% organic cotton from Spain. Single breasted with notch lapels. Two front patch pockets. Unlined. Oversized for comfortable, relaxed look. Unstructured.

name: Double-Pleat Cotton Pant
description: Made in Portugal. 100% organic cotton from Spain. Double pleats with zip fly and button closure. Side seam slanted front pockets and patch pockets on the back.

name: Rugby Drawstring Shorts
description: Made in Canada. 100% cotton, 8.0 oz. Practice Cloth. Elastic waistband with drawstring. Front side pockets and single welt pocket on back. Embroidered winged foot logo patch above hem

name: Short Sleeved Rugby
description: Made in Canada. 100% cotton. 8.0 oz Practice Cloth with engineered stripes. Rib knit collar. Embroidered logo below placket. Neil is 6'1" and wearing size M

name: Striped Short Sleeve Top
description: Made in Portugal. 100% cotton jersey. Engineered stripes. Contrast rib knit collar. Embroidered logo on sleeve.

name: Boardshorts
description: Lightweight enough to surf in. Strong enough to take a beating on the rocks. The Noah SS25 boardshorts are built for the road, the surf and everything that can be thrown at it. The trunks feature three functional pockets to fit anything you need on a day's journey inside of them with ample mesh drainage to keep water moving and prevent ballooning. Made in Sri Lanka Double-layered nylon from Japan Button fly with boot lace closure Patch pockets with drain vents and button closure on side and back Hand pocket on the wearer's right side Interior mesh drainage Key loop on back pocket Logo embroidery above hem

name: Cotton Tartan Volley Short
description: Made in Portugal. 100% cotton, 3.4oz poplin. Elasticated drawstring waist. Nylon mesh liner. Side seam welt pockets. Back yoke with zipper-closure pocket. Embroidered iris on leg. Neil is 6'1" and wearing size M. Hannah is 5'11” and is wearing size M

name: Relaxed Fit Rugby
description: Made in Canada. 100% cotton, 8.0 oz Practice Cloth. Cotton twill collar and placket with 3 button closure and box stitch reinforcement. Rib knit cuffs. Split hem with side vents. Embroidered logo above sleeve cuff. Slightly boxier for an oversized and relaxed fit.

name: Bow 6-Panel
description: Made in USA. 100% sanded cotton. Adjustable self-fabric ties. Embroidered logo on front.

name: Summer's Polo
description: Made in Portugal. 100% cotton piqué. Flat knit scalloped collar with three-button placket closure. Split hem with side vents. Embroidered logo on sleeve.

name: Beaded Boat Shoe
description: Made in Portugal. 100% leather. Non-slip sole. Metal hardware. Leather laces with plastic beads.

name: Pleated Jean
description: Made in USA 100% cotton, Japanese selvedge denim Relaxed 5-pocket style with single front pleats Zip fly with metal shank closure, copper rivets Woven label on coin pocket The single-pleated front on these jeans offers extra volume, creating a slightly looser fit than our classic 5-pocket jeans Our selvedge denim is expertly crafted in Japan utilizing old world weaving techniques, resulting in a highly compact, dense cloth which differs greatly from the conventional denim you see on the market today. The beauty in this style of weaving is the unique character in all the fabric produced.
